Class ApplicationController

java.lang.Object
main.controller.ApplicationController
public class ApplicationController extends Object
Controller for application-related operations in the BTO Management System. Handles applying, withdrawing, approving/rejecting applications, and flat selection. Uses project name as the unique project identifier.
Since:
2025-04-17

      public ApplicationController(ApplicationRepository applicationRepository, ProjectRepository projectRepository, UserRepository userRepository)

      applicationRepository - Repository for applications
      projectRepository - Repository for projects
      userRepository - Repository for users

  • Method Details

    • applyForProject

      public boolean applyForProject(String userNRIC, String projectName, String flatType)
      Allows an applicant to apply for a BTO project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project to apply for
      flatType - Type of flat being applied for
      applicantNRIC - NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      true if application succeeds, false otherwise

    • requestWithdrawal

      public boolean requestWithdrawal(String applicantNRIC, String projectName)
      Processes withdrawal request for an application.
      Parameters:
      applicantNRIC - NRIC of the applicant
      projectName - Name of the project
      Returns:
      true if withdrawal request succeeds, false otherwise

    • approveApplication

      public boolean approveApplication(String applicationId, String managerNRIC)
      Approves a BTO application (Manager only).
      Parameters:
      applicationId - ID of the application
      managerNRIC - NRIC of approving manager
      Returns:
      true if approval succeeds, false otherwise

    • rejectApplication

      public boolean rejectApplication(String applicationId, String managerNRIC)
      Rejects a BTO application (Manager only).
      Parameters:
      applicationId - ID of the application
      managerNRIC - NRIC of rejecting manager
      Returns:
      true if rejection succeeds, false otherwise

    • approveWithdrawal

      public boolean approveWithdrawal(String applicationId, String managerNRIC)
      Approves a withdrawal request (Manager only).
      Parameters:
      applicationId - ID of the application
      managerNRIC - NRIC of approving manager
      Returns:
      true if approval succeeds, false otherwise

    • getPendingWithdrawalRequests

      public List<Application> getPendingWithdrawalRequests()
      Retrieves all applications with pending withdrawal requests.
      Returns:
      List of applications with pending withdrawal status

    • rejectWithdrawal

      public boolean rejectWithdrawal(String applicationId, String managerNRIC)
      Rejects a withdrawal request for an application. Only a manager of the project can reject.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to reject withdrawal for
      managerNRIC - The NRIC of the manager performing the rejection
      Returns:
      true if rejection succeeds, false otherwise

    • updateFlatSelection

      public boolean updateFlatSelection(String officerNRIC, String applicantNRIC, String projectName, String flatType)
      Updates flat selection (Officer only).
      Parameters:
      officerNRIC - NRIC of HDB Officer
      applicantNRIC - NRIC of applicant
      projectName - Name of the project
      flatType - Type of flat selected
      Returns:
      true if update succeeds, false otherwise
